attributes.action: stop the closure of Falmer High School in Brighton & Hove and hold a ballot to decide if an Academy is what the community wants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please stop the closure of the already improving Falmer High school in Brighton & Hove only to replace it with an Academy that will specialise in entrepreneurship and sport.  Keep Falmer High School as a state comprehensive run by education professionals and not a wealthy businessman with no educational background.  Allow the school to continue to improve and enable the staff to continue to do their jobs to a high standard under the leadership of the Head.  A ballot across the Brighton and Hove community would provide evidence that an academy is NOT actually wanted.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop the closure of Falmer High School in Brighton & Hove and hold a ballot to decide if an Academy is what the community wants."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
